name: Mafia Food Wars
description:
In an anarchist future, Mafias feed their families through black market auctions.

You represent one of these families.

Bid to acquire food to feed your family, or to drive up the price of an item another family wants. Family members who cannot be fed will defect for the family with the most food. Can you defeat and assimilate the other families?

This game was made in 7 days for BOUNDLESS JAM.
